subject: Power supply
description_text:
Hello.
Im thinking of buying Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional but unsure if the power supply come with EU plugg or not,cant fins any info on the site about it?


Skickat från Outlook för Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi aa aa,    Please rest assured that purchasing the Haptics bundle includes a power plug compatible with your region.
